message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that I'm losing money faster with each round.
Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a more balanced split that recognizes the time pressure we both face.
Bob, I understand you want a fair deal.  My new offer is a compromise, acknowledging the time pressure while still reflecting the faster devaluation I face.
Alice, we're running out of time and your offers haven't been reasonable.  This is a fair split considering the devaluation we both face. Let's close this deal.
